name: Ultimate Whovian VII — TARDIS Dashboard [Tumblr]
description: A Doctor Who theme for your Tumblr dashboard. "This is part of my Ultimate Whovian tumblr style, uploaded separately so you can mix and match anyway you like it! =)". Recycled from the original and repaired.
additional_info:
"Check out the other Ultimate Whovian Modules.
  • [Module I]— Gallifreyan Icons The actual words transliterated into my favourite Gallifreyan style.
  • [Module II] — TARDIS key Selector The classic TARDIS key. I never got why they stopped using this layout, it's beautiful.
  • [Module III] — Timecracked Logo I might add more options on later versions, but for now, just avoid getting into the glow.
  • [Module IV] — Doctor Who Icons HOME — The TARDIS! INBOX — A hypercube: my rendition of the Time Lord mail thingie as seen in The Doctors Wife. HELP — K-9: The Doctor's little helper =) SETTINGS — Bowtie: because he's always fixing it. LOGOUT — A Dalek: because EXTERMINATE!
  • [Module V] — Return to Top Modified 11th's era TARDIS logo.
  • [Module VI] — Sonic Screwdriver Cursor 10th's Sonic Screwdriver with mouseover action =]
  • [Module VII] — TARDIS Dashboard You can choose from two delicious flavours: a) a serious Tardis pattern (this is the one I use, because I'm serious. HEY I AM!) and b) The TARDIS flying over the Impossible Galaxy!
Have fun, and please, leave me your impressions and suggestions." Recycled from style 74496 by user 146962 and repaired. (No, not with a sonic screwdriver.)

style_settings.label: Alter the fabric of space-time (er, choose a background image)
